thread.title: Healthy Retreat in the Midst of Times Square Craziness
thread.title_full: Healthy Retreat in the Midst of Times Square Craziness - Review of EVEN Hotel Times Square South, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Lyn M
title: Healthy Retreat in the Midst of Times Square Craziness
text:
EVEN Hotels Times Square South is a wonderful hotel who has thought of every detail to help you stay on track with your health while staying at their property. We love the filtered water and complimentary water bottle, in-room stability ball and yoga mat, stand-up desk, workout zone in room, top-quality workout center and comfy bed. My kids LOVED the ping pong table downstairs and it served as a nice break from all the walking around New York City. This is also a great location south of Times Square but close to the High Line, Chelsea, Hell's Kitchen and Madison Square Garden. Great if you want to go to Times Square but stay out of the chaos!
Room Tip: Choose a floor with a filtered water machine See more room tips
